text.__SUMMARY__: Shorea longisperma (called, along with some other species in the genus Shorea, Yellow Meranti) is a species of plant in the Dipterocarpaceae family. It is found in Sumatra and Borneo.
text.References: Ashton, P. 1998.  Shorea longisperma.   2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.   Downloaded on 23 August 2007.
